descriptionMdByRank.1: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores **8** Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1 time every 20s.
descriptionMdByRank.2: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores **10** Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1 time every 20s.
descriptionMdByRank.3: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores **12** Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1 time every 20s.
descriptionMdByRank.4: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores **14** Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1 time every 20s.
descriptionMdByRank.5: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores **16** Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1 time every 20s.
